website_summaries.verdict: For the ultimate dog lover who wants to run with multiple dogs at a time.
pros: Corralling multiple bigger dogs at once can be a tough task
But they need exercise and this product allows for that to go smoothly and without lingering pain
Comes with a money-back guarantee and this brand gets positive marks for its customer service
cons: People with smaller waists might find it hard to use this product

customer_reviews.title: Great for Huskies
customer_reviews.text: I walk two huskies several times a day. It is a delight to have my hands free. I got a swivel hook to put both leashes on one hook so the dogs can trade places while walking. It is good to have to waist belts is you have two walkers of different sizes because it takes a bit of time to get the fit just right. The bungees on the leashes are good shock absorbers. I would love to see the belt have a wide cushion in the back to offer additional support when the dogs pull. I solved that issue for myself by cutting a bit of a swimming noodle in half and making a back cushion.
customer_reviews.author: EHB

customer_reviews.title: Best leash I've owned
customer_reviews.text: I have a 75 lb black lab who is a vigorous puller. He's worn out my old leash so I needed a new one. I read the reviews and settled on this one - and am very happy I did. The double bungee system does a marvelous job in letting him know when he's pushing things too far, and the dual handles really help with control when things get too exciting for him. Because he's now less successful pulling, he's finally making real progress with training after a year of very slow work. Thanks so much. I only wish it came in blue because my other black lab's entire gear setup is blue!
customer_reviews.author: Kristine C

customer_reviews.title: Big hit!
customer_reviews.text: I went to a Humane Society fundraiser over this past weekend and used this leash for the first time. I didn't use the part that goes around the waist, because my plan was to be more hands-on than that due to multiple other dogs being there. The leash is great! the many ways and places to grab the leash made it feel very intuitive and it was easy to pull my dog in closer when more, let's just say "energetic" dogs were nearby. The leash was a big hit with other attendees who asked where they could buy one as well. I'd say money well spent!
customer_reviews.author: Proggy McGee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent leash!
customer_reviews.text: This is way better than the one I bought made by a different brand. I use this hands free leash to walk and run with my 30+ lb dog. My previous leash was ruined by my other dog (he chewed it until it’s broken 🙄), but I’m now happy that I had to buy a new one because I’m so happy with this new leash. This one I don’t have to periodically adjust the waist because it doesn’t come loose! And the length is easy to adjust because of the multiple rings at various lengths. And the loop for your hand is well-padded for comfort! Seems very sturdy so far. I’m happy with this!
customer_reviews.author: Lilian

customer_reviews.title: God Send for people with Arthritis and Spine issues, dog love it.
customer_reviews.text: I love these leashes so much I have the double also. It works great with a “Zero to 60 faster than a whippet” dog. It works great with a reactive dog that is basically a chunk of lunging muscle. The handles are very comfortable even when a pup is pulling/running. It’s great to be handsfree for picnics, and eating at outdoor cafes. The bungees absorb so much of the pull I can even walk my dogs during a flare up. I know this is geared towards runners, but it’s a great product if you have back/spine/wrists or soft tissue issues.
customer_reviews.author: Dera Dud

customer_reviews.title: 100% recommend
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this 10 stars I would. Total game changer. I have a 70lb Staffordshire terrier and he is a strong puller. He has to get there before anyone else. For as much please training as we have done and used various collars, harnesses and leashes, this is the only thing I have used that made me say hooray! We took it out for a spin yesterday and I couldn't be happier. It's great to have most of the pull on my core rather than my shoulder. I still have the ability to pull him in short and actually had way more control that with a regular lease. I can't wait to take him on more walks now.
customer_reviews.author: hikinghoney

customer_reviews.title: Great for curious Labs
customer_reviews.text: The belt has ample room for the chubby person and comfortable. The handles on the lead are great for reeling in my dog when needed.The stretch in the lead it self is great for when my Lab decides to go a different way. He's not highly train.Ha! It has stop me from being jerked or toppled several times when something catches his eye. Made from quality canvas strapping and quality snaps.I love walking and beach combing hands-free.I can still wander around and pick up things while keeping my sometimes unruly Lab in tow. Great product, highly recommend for older persons with big dog.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: I/We love it!
customer_reviews.text: We just took our first walk with this waist leash and it was great! I have a 75 lb 9-month-old bernedoodle puppy who has dragged me around the neighborhood since I got her - sniffing squirrel tracks, finding small branches to carry, etc. As I am a medium sized almost 72-year-old lady, she was a lot to handle. I clipped the leash to her no-pull harness and off we went. It was the most pleasant walk we’ve taken. I was especially happy that I can wear mittens (I live in Wisconsin, so kind of important) and still confidently take her out in public. Thank you for this amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: Tosateacher

customer_reviews.title: I reallly like this product
customer_reviews.text: I reallly like this product. Wether your running or riding a value or walking around the farmers market it’s nice to be hands free with the leash. My only complaint is when running my dog runs in front of me and tends to go side to side (he’s a puppy still and easily distracted) and that motion causes he belt to move across my abdomen. I got kind of a rug burn from the belt. I wish it had a sort of padding on it. So now when we run I tuck my shirt in my bottoms so it doesn’t rub against my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Neelie Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Very Good quality materials.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter fit the harness and leash to our Boxer and went for a brief run this evening with her. She said it worked well and that Hatikvah was not so easily able to pull on the leash. My daughter is in pre-Med and works I the ER of the hospital where I work. She is quick to point out my opinions as either well founded or flawed. She found nothing to complain about the harness and leash, which says a lot. As a medical professional and a lover of Boxers, I recommend these items.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: This is the best to handle my crazy (21 lb) MinPin!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best leash to handle my crazy (21 lb) MinPin! Even my 83 y/o mom was able to walk him without him pulling away. It is very sturdy and durable under normal use. Very comfortable and easy to transition from short to long leash. I was a little concerned that the leash would be a little heavy for my little guy, but it was perfect. Not a problem with the product (only my crazy dog) ... but, can you buy just the belt part? I LOVE this for my 21 pound MinPin -- but he ate the belt! It was the best to walk him with and I miss using it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, needs slight improvement.
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love, Love this concept....... Have ordered another for a friend. Would give it 5 stars if it lasted longer. I have had this since March of 2020 and have used it everyday. I have a Canaan Dog that weighs around 55 lbs. The bungee at one of the ends has broken. I do not leave this in the sun or out in the cold. Need to improve the design a bit. Please make two models: One for small dogs (lighter bungee and same belt) Dogs over 30 Lbs ( Heavier bungee such as used in horse trailer ties) metal belt clasps that do not loosen with pulling due to jogging.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: This was my last option. Should have been my first!
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit, I didn't think it would work. I have 2 huskies that pull or jerk at a moment's notice. I have nerve damage to my hands and was afraid they would yank leases out of hand and end up running. I have tried everything..this was my last resort..well, it should have been my first. Today I used for first time and I was impressed. Thank you so much! Now I can enjoy walking my dogs! :)
customer_reviews.author: Wishfulthinking

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Hands are in less pain.
customer_reviews.text: My hands have been hurting from over use: typing and working out; my dog also is a puller so my hands were in pain. This was a great solution! Good, sturdy material. I like the positioning of the handles compared to the other option on amazon - works for my dog's size without choking her when I want her nearby (25lb medium dog) It comes with a few knots to make the leash slightly shorter. I added 3 extra knots because I like having my dog closer to me; it also prevents leash drag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: All I have to say is that I wish I had bought these earlier! It provides easy grip, and does absorb the shock from sudden pull as it advertised! The options of different length is also very helpful. When I need to keep the leash shorter, I just wrap the leash around my waist, the hook the clip to both the second ring on the leash and on the waist band. I can also attach my dog’s waste bag to it. So I am really able to run with my dog without holding the leash or poop bag! Highly recommend jt
customer_reviews.author: ella

customer_reviews.title: Not to easy to adjust belt to a small waist
customer_reviews.text: I really like how this belt looks, and the loving spirit and dreams for pets I really share with the owners. But the belt part is kind of hard to adjust to a small waist like mine. I would upgrade my review if the owners of the company either uploaded a video explaining an easy way to make the belt smaller without the extra part hanging weirdly on the side, maybe with a clip or something to hide it. Maybe I am not doing it the right way (hence, the video’s need) Later on the belt could be designed with these issues in mind, improved.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this leash! I was skeptical at the beginning since my 95lbs GSD is a puller and I was picturing myself on the ground first time we walk but I gave it a try and it works great! It has few handles so you can have control over your dog. When we see squirrel I just grab the handle closest to his neck and shorten the leash. I actually feel more secure now as I know the leash won't slip from my hand. It's comfortable and quickly became my favorite leash. We use it every day and I don't plan on switching anytime soon.
customer_reviews.author: cwin

customer_reviews.title: Looked like a good product
customer_reviews.text: I'm not really the person who should be reviewing this. I actually had to send it back twice because the item in the box was not correct. We ordered red and black so my husband could run with our dog. The box was marked red and black, but the item inside was very pink.... We sent it back and received a second box marked red and black that was also pink. It appears a group was mispackaged. We gave up while Amazon was looking into the issue.
customer_reviews.author: DFK

customer_reviews.title: Lucky my dog is alive
customer_reviews.text: To be brief, the metal clips on this leash are crap. I’ve had it for less than a year and today one of the clips fell apart, freeing my dog to dart into traffic or wherever he wanted to go. Fortunately nothing bad happened, but it could have. I love the design but the quality sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this Hands Free Dog Leash from Pet Dreamland
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this Hands Free Dog Leash from Pet Dreamland. It is made from extremely high-quality materials, so I can tell it will last for a very long time. It is perfect for taking my German Shorthaired Pointer on runs and for walking my lower-energy, yet extremely strong, pit bull mix. The belt is fully adjustable and very comfortable. The Bungee cords in the leash give a quick, corrective tug to my dogs when they pull, without me having to do a thing. The padded handles are convenient and comfortable if I want to have a bit more control. I couldn't be happier with my purchase...thank you, Pet Dreamland!
customer_reviews.author: lamartini

customer_reviews.title: Great leash for strong pullers
customer_reviews.text: I just received this leash tonight and immediately took my 65 lb GSD on a run to try it out. Let me say that even though she’s small for her breed, she can move! We have neighbors with a 130 lb male shepherd and the husband once remarked that my dog’s “sure got a motor on her”! LOL With her other leashes and leads, I can only do about half my normal solo run because she tugs so hard. Keeping her in control is an effort. This leash is a revelation. Let me say that again... REVELATION! I don’t write many reviews, but if you have a dog “with a motor on her”, get this leash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handy hands-free leash...
customer_reviews.text: I had to wait until I had used this leash several times prior to posting a rating. Initially did not like - seemed too bulky as I planned to use while hiking/snowshoeing & there’s already a waist belt from the back pack... but... Yes, it works well. Depends on if dog wants to lead or follow as to where you clipin to the leash. Bungee is good as it provides necessary give but then difficult to give a little behavior reminder tug on the leash. All in all a good product that I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia J. Kidder

customer_reviews.title: Great for leash reactivity training!
customer_reviews.text: I will update this review in a month or two to let everybody know how it's held up, but so far so good! I have a 27 LB beagle pointer mix with severe leash reactivity/leash aggression/fear aggression. we've been working on it for months now but it's very difficult with one hand constantly occupied by a leash, so I was really excited about the idea "hands off" aspect of this duo. I've also realized that the bungee helps a great deal, I'm assuming because it gives my dog a tinnnyyy bit of pull so he feels less restrained. The leash is extremely good quality, everything is very sturdy and well stitched.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great for smaller dogs
customer_reviews.text: So far this leash has worked well for us. It isn't too bulky or heavy for my 17 lb dog like other leashes were. The clasps seem durable and the bungee portion really softens any jerking or pulling she may do. I'm very pleased with it so far and my dog hasn't seemed bothered by its presence. Other bungee leashes would sag greatly due to their weight and annoy my dog on her backside or tap her shoulder causing her to jerk away from it. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Red HikerTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality compared to all the other ones I've tried! Sooo glad I bought this, definitely worth the money. I push a stroller and have the dog with me so getting something like this really helped manage everything on our walks. My dog occasionally does run after a squirrel or lizard and when she does, the bungie cords on the leash save my back from what I'm sure would be catastrophic damage if they weren't there.
customer_reviews.author: s.c.

customer_reviews.title: Has room for improvement!
customer_reviews.text: The good! Love the waist control (we have a puller) Works great on runs The bad: Bungee stretches and pulls out in less than a month. And what’s the deal With the clips? They both lost their pull down buttons. Had this product less than a year but it has been tested and these are my findings.. ty
customer_reviews.author: Brook Burkhardt

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: The colors are nice. It’s holding up well but only had it about a week or two. My puppy does chew it sometimes. The only bad thing I would say is that the handles aren’t at the end of the leash. They’re about 6-8 inches from the ends. It’s kinda weird. They make it like that because there’s a clip at the end so you can attach to your waste on a belt that comes included. It’s cool but I’m not wearing a belt and attaching my leash to it. Good buy, though!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great running leash belt
customer_reviews.text: This belt is really great to keep my hands free while walking the dog. I have gone running with the pup as well and the leash has done a great job of gathering and extending when our distances change. My only wish is that the bungie was a bit stronger. It gives way to easily which I believe will cause the leash to eventually lose it's elasticity.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great design
customer_reviews.text: Great combo of waist clip and bungee-style leash. Allows me to be hands-free (and to use my body weight rather than arm/shoulder to stop a sprint to catch a squirrel) and have a slight give in the leash. Best component: the double leash handles. I didn’t realize how useful these would be for shortening the length of the leash for e.g. shifting from the road to a narrow sidewalk (handle #1) or drawing my pup in closer when an approaching dog looks less than friendly or a bike appears as if out of nowhere (handle #2). Wonderfully versatile!
customer_reviews.author: dp

customer_reviews.title: Helps take the strain off my shoulder when walking my dog.
customer_reviews.text: With an injured shoulder, no matter which side my awesome dog walked on-it hurt. This solved the problem. It is very sturdy. My dog is just 48 lbs. so he is always borderline in sizes and weight categories. This is a little on the heavy side for him, but works great. It will be perfect for larger dogs too.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this leash! I broke my elbow recently and ordered this so it was easier to walk my pup. I wish I would have gotten this sooner as I love how comfortable it is and how easy it is to walk Reina when she pulls. The bungees are great shock absorbers! The handles are padded and comfortable. Wonderful for long hikes or short walks. All around amazing leash and company!
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: I got the small dog leash today for my 18lb mini Aussie. The bungee part of the leash already lost its elasticity. Update- Got a replacement and its working very well. Would recommend now!!
customer_reviews.author: Nature lover

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product works just as I was hoping. I was having problems with my elbow in trying to train my dog to walk beside me. The sudden pull on the leash from time to time was causing problems. With this product, I am almost pain free now. The bungee part acts as a bit of a cushion and having it around my waist allows me to use my body weight instead of my elbow joint. Addie and I are both happier.
customer_reviews.author: kate

customer_reviews.title: I bought a second one
customer_reviews.text: Im really happy with this hands free leash. I use this for running, hiking and walking my dog. It has a few D rings to shorten the lead for keeping puppy close when needed or unhook and give them more freedom. Has a great reflective stitching and I also hook on a poop bag on a D ring on the belt. Liked it so much I bought another for our lake cabin.
customer_reviews.author: sky15425

customer_reviews.title: This is the best leash I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: This is the best leash I have ever used. I run with my goldendoodle daily, and this finally allows me to run with her "hands free". The bungee makes it easier on my dog when she stops and I don't...automatically giving her a gentle pull as I keep running. The adjustable size is great for walking in areas where you can give your dog more freedom. I have been using it for about 2 months, and it appears well made and durable. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: The Chadd

customer_reviews.title: Versatile leash!
customer_reviews.text: This hands free leash is exactly what I needed for my active one year old poodle. I like the fact that she can be at my side when I’m outside working in the yard. I can quickly change the length of her line when I need her closer for a walk. The give/elasticity in the line is perfect for both of us- she gently feels the end of the line and I’m not jarred by a tug now and then. I really enjoy this leash.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Clark

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product for small dogs!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you so much for creating a smaller/lighter leash for small dogs! I’m glad I stumbled across here, I was unable to find small ones anywhere on amazon. I recently broke my leg, making it very hard to walk my dog. I purchased this leash, and it is amazing!! The bungee works great when absorbing my dog trying to pull me over in my crutches! Thank you so much for creating this product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nic Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Great leash
customer_reviews.text: So far the best running leash I have found. Seems to be very durable. I like the length options and the handholds are great. I wish it had a more secure clasp, I’ve had no issues with this one but something that locked close would give me better piece of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Michele McCammon

customer_reviews.title: This item is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this leash. It is multi-purpose allowing you to keep the belt attached but walk as a regular leash with one of the 2 handles. The lower handle is useful for keeping distance and crossing streets. I can also detach the leash from the belt if my husband is walking the pup with me and turn it over to him as a regular leash. Excellent quality, bungee just enough to stop the dramatic tug when he takes off but not so much that you can't keep your pup close to you.
customer_reviews.author: newsgirl

customer_reviews.title: Saved my back!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 30 pound rambunctious goldendoodle. He’s adorable but pulls and has a mind of his own on walks. This leash saved my back! I actually started running with him on it! I’m 5’4 and 110 pounds and I adjusted the waist to fit perfectly! I don’t know why more people don’t use this instead of a traditional leash. Since using this my neck and back pain is gone!
customer_reviews.author: Laila Waziri

customer_reviews.title: very versatile system
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! High quality materials and manufacturing. Also, it's reasonably long, when using the full length, but has the ability to clip to intermediate length, so there are two different shorter lengths you can have, depending on what you need. I think it's also super helpful that you can easily convert the part that's not around your waist into a conventional leash so you can hand the dog off to someone without taking off the belt portion. And the ability to also quickly tether the leash around a stationary object without unclipping the dog is great as well. I'd definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Randy Shay

customer_reviews.title: Great build quality, looks great too - very happy with it and would definitely order again
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this product. I've only had it a week so was going to wait to post a review, but it is actually better than I thought it was going to be by the photos. Seems really well made, the lead is great, got a nice spring but very sturdy, and the clips are solid and of a decent size. I chose the greens and orange and it looks excellent. I have a young German Shepard and this feels very safe for all her pulling as we train her. My kids like it so much they have claimed it as theirs for walking the dog. I will try to send some photos later with another review. Many thanks. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Reid

customer_reviews.title: Best running leash!
customer_reviews.text: The Pet dreamland hands free leash is the best leash we have bought for our dog. I'm an avid runner and wasn't able to get my dog on run with a regular lease, but the Pet dreamland leash allows me to take my energetic lab mix with me. The bungee leash really helps when my dog pulls and this allows us to take him for runs to exhaust his puppy energy. We are very happy with our purchase and our dog loves going on his daily runs now. I would highly recommend this product to any dog lover; it is very high quality and very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Option for Hands-On/Hands-Free
customer_reviews.text: Nice leash- comfortable. Improves my confidence in running with my buddy- if I was to crash and burn, she would still be attached to me. Is also nice to be able to easily bring her close or let her out farther, without all the dangers of a retractable leash.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Guttieri

customer_reviews.title: Great leash for running with your dog
customer_reviews.text: I love this leash. It clips around your waist, leaving your arms free to swing as you run. It can be clipped shorter to have your dog closer to you or longer to give it more freedom. There are handles by which you can grab it easily if you need to pull your dog back. It is well made.
customer_reviews.author: Lazy Freesia

customer_reviews.title: Less than 1 year - RIDICULOUS
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in February of 2019 and it has not lasted 1 year before the nobs on both of the spring backed clips came off AND the bungy separated from the fabric. This thing is all looks. 1 year on an item like this = piece of junk in my book!
customer_reviews.author: jpdogma

customer_reviews.title: What a difference!
customer_reviews.text: I used to use a typical, hand held leash when running with my dog. He would pull while running and my arm would get tired. My dog and I have been on quite a few trail runs with this leash and we both absolutely love it! It has helped him to learn not to pull and saves my arms. I LOVE that you can adjust the length. While we hike, I keep it short to keep him beside me and when we run, I’ll let it out and we both have plenty of room without utilizing the entire length. It is sturdy and has held up exceptionally well thus far!
customer_reviews.author: NatureLover

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely buy this , especially if you’re walking a baby and a dog!!
customer_reviews.text: I had never heard of anything like this, so when I saw it on a lightening deal after just having had a baby- I had to had it! Now I can go on walks with our three kids and our Golden with no problems! Thank you so much! My dog has stopped going in the house because he gets to go on more walks like he deserves! This is the best thing since sliced bread-no, seriously.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Best of the best
customer_reviews.text: My dog is a German Shepherd . It is very easy to handle him with this new leash. Looks strong, really nice and versatile. It's beatiful. can be Handsfree if you want and at night is reflective. I strongly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio Montañez

customer_reviews.title: Greatest way to walk an energetic dog!
customer_reviews.text: After major surgery that disallowed pulling on my upper body in any way, I talked to our dog trainer, tried her waist leash, and purchased this one. It is the best method of walking ever, even now that I am healed. Our energetic rescue is learning much faster, can enjoy himself but also heal nicely with the closer handle to him. Having 2 handles and several sturdy hooks is handy. I hook his water bottle to one, and away we go!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Leash!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 1yo very active small sized mixed breed dog.I have tennis elbow and I am unable to hold the leash in my right dominate arm. He is constantly pulling me & I am afraid he will make me fall. I got this leash 2 days ago...it is AMAZING! The padded handles make it much easier to control him when we come up on a dog or he tries to run. I love the fact I can run short distances w/him completely hands free!
customer_reviews.author: Tracie D. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great hands-free leash
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoying this hands-free dog leash. Good quality and durability. I like this stretchy / bouncy leash with multiple hoops at various lengths that you can clip to the belt to make the leash as short as needed. My dog is 60 pounds and likes to walk in front and tug on the leash. Had elbow surgery recently and it would stress my arm holding his leash in my hands. Bought this and it was just what I needed. Now we can both enjoy our walks again.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product - durable, makes walking my dog & my neighbor's dog do-able
customer_reviews.text: it's a well thought out and designed product. and every component is high quality. i know because i've had it over a year walking 2 dogs almost every day. TOTALLY WORTH IT! also fantastic customer service - super impressed with their second mile efforts to ensure my happy satisfaction. great product AND people to work with.
customer_reviews.author: holly wall

customer_reviews.title: Made jogging with my dog enjoyable
customer_reviews.text: My leash arrived in 1 day and we used it immediately. It was the first time we tried jogging together. My 85 pound one year old puppy did great. She stayed right by my side with slack in the leash. She absolutely loved "running" and had a big smile the whole time. I haven't been much of a runner, but I'm looking forward to this new healthy hobby with my best bud.
customer_reviews.author: StacyC

customer_reviews.title: No lost dog because of dropped leash!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I always use the belt and bungee leash for extra control when walking our large dog. We purchased this because we both have arthritis and had experienced panic and terror because we had dropped the leash and almost lost our baby. This is our perfect solution 🤗
customer_reviews.author: SandiA

customer_reviews.title: Versatile product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this leash to have better control of my "ambitious" dog (pulls like mad, but we are working on correcting that behavior...) In the meantime, this leash helps provide as little or as much freedom on the leash. I particularly like the 2 handles at different height; these are great in lieu of wrapping my hand in a standard leash which is uncomfortable with a strong dog. One thing I wished was different in the design, for my current purpose anyway, is the "bounce". It seems that the portion of the leash closest to the dog should be a "hard" section to keep the dog at close range as needed.
customer_reviews.author: 4EverDoggyLove

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly what you would expect, but not so bad either!
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this product is not bad. But, the rubber got stretched after few weeks of use. And this is NOT 10 ft, the length of the leash is 8ft. Even when stretched, still not 10'. The material is good and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: julianna menkoff

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this thing. I walk my dog and baby girl (in stroller) every morning. My hands are free to push the stroller, pick up 💩 and adjust the length as needed. It’s a great, durable material. The clips are sturdy, the belt is great! I would buy this over and over again! Oh - it looks good too.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and versitle.
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this all stars. I've had a cheap bungie type leash for years with my black mouth cur. Got this one for our now 50pound plott hound pup. She can put on a pull when on a sniff. This leash is so versitle. I have a baby in my arms with dogs many times a day. This is a great reasonably priced leash. You want be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: None

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not very tough.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the leash to go run with my husky. Although the leash is very convenient, the elastic band inside the leash snapped when my husky was pulling on the leash.
customer_reviews.author: Jondre

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t had it very long and the bungee already snapped and doesn’t work anymore. Also the belt has extra loops on it which makes it hard to wear with a backpack
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Great for hiking and snowboarding
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this everyday for two weeks. It’s become my go- to leash. Walking, hiking, and splitboarding, the whole thing is high quality. My golden doodle (60lbs) pulls hard on the leash but the elastic feels strong and sturdy. The waist gets a tiny bit loose after a few walks but I think this is normal with how much my dog pulls. However, the change is minimal. Never had any other waist leash but this one is great.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Butler

customer_reviews.title: Great Until it Breaks
customer_reviews.text: This was my favorite leash that I've bought. However, one of the clips completely snapped and my 48 pound Lab-Shepherd mix almost got loose. She's not that bug of a dog, it should have lasted much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Ali F.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: My husband got me this leash. I have owned several leashes including hands free ones and this one is the best ever. It does not tighten on my waist or pull on my back and allows me to have control of an over excitable dog. Went for a leashed walk in sometimes dense woods and it didn’t get tangled once. Very well made, heavy duty not thin and cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff B

customer_reviews.title: I like to take my camera and it is hard to ...
customer_reviews.text: This leash has been very helpful in allowing me to walk my dog hands free. I like to take my camera and it is hard to take pictures with a leash in one hand, especially with a young dog who hasn't developed a lot of patience yet! The two handles come in handy for allowing me to have a little more control when he pulls too much. I've used the shorter handle to help with my 'heel' training.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Look ma no hands
customer_reviews.text: I bought this leash originally for when my dog is old enough to run, but I recently went camping and it was a life saver. The camp ground did not allow offleash dogs so this hands off leash definitely came in handy. It’s extremely durable, it went in the water was dragged through the dirt and once I just rinsed it off it was like nothing had happened. I like that I could make the leash longer or shorter by just clipping in the middle ring to the waist belt, I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Meiling

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for large dogs who pull.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, amazing leash for large dogs that pull! I use this in conjunction with a gentle leader for my 90 lb of muscle Ridgeback and I have zero fear! You can use this if you run or just for a walk in the neighborhood. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B.

customer_reviews.title: Much better than running with a leash in your hand
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty cool leash. I just used it for the first time to run with my dog and definitely a lot easier than having to hold on to a leash with my hand. My dog is only 16 pounds so he isn’t as strong to pull the bungee cord so it doesn’t give him any slack but it does have extra connectors to make it shorter or to give your dog more slack
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: ... belt for a week and so far am very happy. I have two large dogs and currently only ...
customer_reviews.text: I have only been using this leash and belt for a week and so far am very happy. I have two large dogs and currently only walking one at a time.The product appears to be quite well made. Not sure you would like this for a small dog as the leash is hefty, but great for big dogs!
customer_reviews.author: trugus52

customer_reviews.title: Watch their video
customer_reviews.text: I used to dread taking my doodle for walks because he pulled so much. We're working on the training... After reading so many reviews on other hands-free leashes, I still couldn't decide. What sold me on this one was their video that showed how you could adjust the length based on the type of activity (run, walk, train). Needless to say, I thoroughly enjoy walking my dog now.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Mannheimer

customer_reviews.title: Design and durability flaws
customer_reviews.text: The handle closest to the dog is too close. You cannot use the second handle if you lengthen to the middle position because the metal loop is in front of the handle rather then after it. After a handful of walks with my 60 lb dog the first section of bungee broke. I still like the idea of the leash and the use of a belt loop for working with dogs that pull, but this version has design and quality problems.
customer_reviews.author: Occam razor

customer_reviews.title: Lots of control
customer_reviews.text: This leash works really well! Hands free dog walking/running but still a very secure connection and plenty of control over my dog. The handles are in great locations to quickly reel my dog to my side if I need to. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Garrison Family

customer_reviews.title: Please contact me
customer_reviews.text: Updated review, please contact me regarding this product. This is my 3rd purchase of this leash within a year which I love, the handles set-up works great for my disabled needs but after just a month the clip spring is not operating.
customer_reviews.author: JRV

customer_reviews.title: Really good if your dog pulls on walks
customer_reviews.text: We have an 80 lb. dog that really pulls on walks. It used to make my arm and shoulder really sore. This really takes the strain off my arm and I also love the handles that I can use when I want to hold him close when crossing the street. Now I look forward to walking my dog instead of dreading it. I am glad I purchased this product. It is really well made and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: BoobyQ

customer_reviews.title: Completely recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.text: We have been having issues with our dogs and them being leash reactive. So when our dogs have been off lease they are fine meeting other dogs no issues yet on leash they were having issues meeting due to excitement or anxiety. This leash has completely revolutionized our walks and our dog's behaviors!!! I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to a standard leash if you want to be hands free
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it, I got it for hiking and to make long walks easier I like that I can adjust it to make it shorter easily to keep my dog closer to me, overall nothing bad to say I had some worries before I got it but it’s been so easy and fun to use
customer_reviews.author: Alysia Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: The best of its kind IMO but bungee won’t last
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought two different brands of this type of hands free leash and this is by far my favorite! Very intuitive design allows for a “short leash” when needed such as in crowded areas or when other dogs are around, as well as a long leash when walking or running. The only issue is that the Bungies on all three parts no longer work. They’re stretched out to their limit after just 3 weeks of daily use. Unfortunately but still my favorite. I’d still recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: German

customer_reviews.title: highly recommended!!...
customer_reviews.text: For 7 years I searched for a suitable product to walk at ease with my two labradors ... and now I finally found this ... I use this product every day ... Super product ... very sturdy , very solid material, reflective and it does what it promises! I will never get into trouble again when walking my dogs out and my labradors can also walk at ease. I'm super happy with this product !!
customer_reviews.author: Maritza E

customer_reviews.title: Nice running leash
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice running leash. It's easy to use and durable. Running with my dog is a lot more comfortable with this waist leash, so my hands can move freely. This leash has handles that I can grab hold of if I would need to.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Good for hiking
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for hiking with my dog so I could have my hands free. It worked perfectly! The extra hand loops work well when you need to keep him close. It’s a bit heavy for my 10lb dog, but since I use a body harness it’s fine. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy K

customer_reviews.title: Great for training and hiking
customer_reviews.text: This is SO great! Makes walks and outings much more enjoyable. It’s excellent for training and comfortable to wear. All parts are solid and I’m not worried about y dog getting lose. I have a small dog but this would great for all sizes. You can make it longer or shorter as needed and I’ve recomended it already to all my furmom/furdad friends!
customer_reviews.author: SaltyMango

customer_reviews.title: Great design and a great quality product
customer_reviews.text: I just got this yesterday and took it running with my running buddy. Well we bothed loved it. He likes not getting caught up in the leash because we can easily shorten and lengthen with the clips. I loved the fit and that it’s reflective plus it also looks like my lowering line.
customer_reviews.author: MartyMoose

customer_reviews.title: Great products
customer_reviews.text: The leash is great. The belt has a hard time staying tight - and I'm realizing that my pulling dogs might hurt my back. Probably should aim for something wider to disperse the pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin S.

customer_reviews.title: Dog walks are more fun with this leash!
customer_reviews.text: This is very good hands free leash! I have a 20# schnauzer who pulls hard on our walks and I was having a difficult time controlling her due to severe arthritis pain in my hands. This leash has made our walks much more enjoyable. Thank you for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: C. A. Bethke

customer_reviews.title: Great multipurpose leash!
customer_reviews.text: Took a good 7 mile walk the day it arrived. It replaced a 15 yr old waist only bungee leash. I have a 40# AusiDoodle & it could not work better. It is a quality well thought out product & the multitude of ways to adjust for your particular needs are incredible. Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this a couple of times stop I may update in the future. That said this leash is sturdy enough for my 90# lab and seems to be built with durable materials. Lots of options for attaching and grab handles. Like it a lot so far.
customer_reviews.author: G Maurice

customer_reviews.title: Dog Leash
customer_reviews.text: Just received & used once. It is sturdy & high quality. I could see the reflective stitching as light was shined on it in the dark. Would like the reflective stitching to be a little more apparent. The maybe a little big on smaller waited individuals.
customer_reviews.author: Sade Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SOLUTION
customer_reviews.text: Bungee cords work great. It was easy to grab the other, shorter handle when necessary. No jerking or pulling on me. But my dog is 11 lbs! Nice product and great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: streetjock

customer_reviews.title: This leash is the greatest
customer_reviews.text: I had to replace my old no pull leash because my dog ate it. This leash is much better in person. It has a strong pull back that stops your pet from pulling right away. Love it. Highly recommend it. We took the knots out right away. The fabric is nice and thick.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Campbell

customer_reviews.title: I need hands free walking
customer_reviews.text: Both of my shoulders need to be replaced, but I still want to walk my dog once I am able. This is absolutely the best. He still pulls some, but no tugging on my arms. Thanks, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: We have used this for several months now and it is a great leash. Being able to adjust length and have a springy buffer if the dog gets excited is a great idea.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Krouse

customer_reviews.title: Great hands-free leash
customer_reviews.text: The leash has multiple points to hold on to which is very convenient. The waist part of the leash is comfortable and easy to adjust. The leash works very well!
customer_reviews.author: MeSm

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: It is very convenient because I can bring my coffee while walking my dog. I am not sure about durability yet as my dog sometimes chewed her leash when she was bored (she is 6 mo old but very large breed) and the leash is still intact but I am not sure for how long.
customer_reviews.author: Sari

customer_reviews.title: I love it! I have a 6 month puppy so ...
customer_reviews.text: So amazon sent me the wrong product. I emailed Christian, the owner of pet dreamland and he sent me the one picture. I love it! I have a 6 month puppy so I try to run with him, so he can let out some energy. It fits well around my waist. The leash has two different handles you can use to pull your pup. The bungee like sensation is easy on my pup and on my hands. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Cin

customer_reviews.title: Great for everything!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my parents and they love it!! Their dog is around 60 lbs and they’ve used is for hiking, running, snow shoeing, etc with no issues!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Much more than I bargained for !!!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a really good sturdy running hands free leash for my dog. She can pull and chew at her leash so I needed it to be durable. This Leash has far exceeded my expectations ! It’s durable and has a bungee cord in it so if she pulls it pulls her back. I love the handles as well for quick access to her when she’s getting beside herself and I absolutely love the 3 length levels you have to work with
customer_reviews.author: ANIKA JACKSON

customer_reviews.title: Great leash, weak clasp
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for about five days. It says it's rated for dogs up 150 lbs. My 120 lb Alaskan Malamute broke the clasp on the side connected to me. When you shorten the leash by putting the D-rings into the clasp it puts all the stress on the weakest part of the clasp. I'm going to try and replace the clasp with a heavy-duty carabiner. The rest of the leash is great and provides a great walking/jogging/hands-free experience for both me and my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Strong and Sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: We had a different leash we used for running and walking. We thought that one was good. However this leash surpasses the old one by miles. It’s stronger, longer, has two handles in the correct places, and it’s more durable. The khaki and orange color is nice as well. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: CRJ

customer_reviews.title: The elastic is really strong and creates great cushioning if the dog tries to pull
customer_reviews.text: The leash is really well made. When I first saw it I was afraid my dog would be able to pull hard and get too far away from me, but the elastic is really stiff so that it cushions against impact, but does not allow my dog to get too far away. We took our dog hiking with it and it was awesome. All the hardware is also sturdy and I think this leash and belt will last us a really long time.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect leash for running and hiking
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a dog leash that doesn't require hands. My dog is a Shiba Inu who is very very active. I use this leash to help him get his daily exercise and motivates me to do the same! Perfect for jogging and hiking.
customer_reviews.author: Akai

product_meta.title: Pet Dreamland Hands Free Dog Leash for Running - Professional Shock Absorbing Bungee Harness - Reflective Waist Dog Leash (Small/Large Dogs)
feature_bullets: 🐕 TAKE YOUR WALKS FROM PAIN TO PLEASURE! This Dog Running Leash Hands Free helps you prevent shoulder or wrist injuries and protects your back and your pet's neck from strain. SAVE YOUR BEST FRIEND FROM LIFELONG DANGERS OF IMPROPER LEASHING. Add to your cart the Waist Leash for Dogs that will CHANGE YOUR LIFE!🐾

🐶 IMPROVE DOG HABITS NOW! The three shock absorbing bungee cords will develop your dog lead manners day by day. The two Neoprene padded handles of the Dog Running Leash will help you control the dog in unexpected situations and your hands will never be sore again! The best hands free leash for large dogs!🐾

❤️ DESIGNED BY HUMANS, WITH LOVE FOR PETS. This running leash for large dogs was built with the help of Oscar, an untrained 7yo Golden Retriever rescued from a shelter. We created this running leash for dogs focusing on the needs of the dog and on the comfort of the owner. 🐾 A bungee leash for running with your dog that will make you easily forget your old way of jogging.🐾

👨‍👧 FOR YOUR ENTIRE FAMILY: With its adjustable waist belt the dog walking belt can be used by active mothers athletes / runners veterans or seniors. SUITED FOR: Dog Training, Jogging, Hiking Cycling. Maybe one of the best running gear for dogs, a dog leash waist belt for running.🐾

🎁 IT'S THE PERFECT GIFT FOR DOG LOVERS: This professional dog hiking gear comes in a beautiful color package. Inside the box you'll find a strong but elastic long leash with a stylish design. Plus you're covered by a 365-DAY 100 MONEY BACK GUARANTEE. Try our IMPROVED MODEL of Running Dog Leash Hands Free! If You Don't LOVE IT Don't Keep It! 🐾
